CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 30, 1959, pg. 36, reads: "NAACP Radiothon - Dedicated to obtaining democracy in fact in this country, the local chapter of the NAACP and Radio Station WAMO last Saturday held a radiothon to appeal to the populace to enlist in fight for freedom by taking out NAACP memberships... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Prudence Bethel, and WAMO Radio Station disc jockeys John "Sir Walter" Christian and Rev. Bill Powell wearing sunglasses and speaking into microphone, for NAACP Radiothon membership drive, Centre Avenue YMCA
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.WAMO (Pittsburgh, Pa).Radio broadcasters--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Microphone--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Sunglasses--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
